content:
Hello, I'd like to clarify what $extract operation should return in the event that no resources were extracted (i.e. if no answers were filled for "extractable" items)? The return parameter on the OperationDefinition is required, so my approach now is to return an empty transaction bundle

{
  "resourceType": "Bundle",
  "type": "transaction"
}

Also, https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/Questionnaire-populate.html and https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/QuestionnaireResponse-extract.html are missing, did the pages move? Links in the IG are still pointing to them.

The profiles have been renamed based on the new IG template. Populate is here: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/StructureDefinition-sdc-questionnaire-populate.html. Extract is https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/StructureDefinition-sdc-questionnaire-extract.html. We haven't fixed all the hyperlinks yet, but we will.
Agree we should add clarity on what happens if there's nothing to extract. Can you submit a change request?

Created https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-26361 :thumbs_up:
Those links are to the StructureDefinition defining the profiles, I am actually looking for the OperationDefinition pages for $extract and $populate which used to exist.
The page for $populate (and $populatehtml, $populatelink, $extract) OperationDefinitions pages are still 404s. Should I open a separate ticket for this? @Lloyd McKenzie
